title: Stage Lv9-P4-S23
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The market is crying out for innovation.
This opportunity is once in a million years.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The market is crying out for innovation.

sentences.kr: 이 기회는 백만 년에 한 번 오는 것입니다.
sentences.en: This opportunity is once in a million years.

sentences.kr: 기술이 무서운 속도로 앞으로 달리고 있습니다.
sentences.en: Technology is racing ahead at breakneck speed.
Time is flying by on wings.
Success is knocking at our door.
This silk is the softest thing in the world.
Money is running away on legs.
His love is deeper than the ocean.
